UserEvent (Enterprise)

Triggered when a user is created or deleted. Only global webhooks can subscribe to this event.

Events API payload

Key Type Description
action string The action that was performed on the user. Can be one of: created or deleted.
user object The user that was created or deleted.

Webhook event name

user

Webhook payload example

{
  "user": {
    "login": "Octocat",
    "id": 9,
    "avatar_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/avatars/u/9?",
    "gravatar_id": "",
    "url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat",
    "html_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/Octocat",
    "followers_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/followers",
    "following_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/following{/other_user}",
    "gists_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/gists{/gist_id}",
    "starred_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}",
    "subscriptions_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/subscriptions",
    "organizations_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/orgs",
    "repos_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/repos",
    "events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/events{/privacy}",
    "received_events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/received_events",
    "type": "User",
    "site_admin": false
  },
  "action": "created",
  "sender": {
    "login": "Octocat",
    "id": 9,
    "avatar_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/avatars/u/9?",
    "gravatar_id": "",
    "url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat",
    "html_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/Octocat",
    "followers_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/followers",
    "following_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/following{/other_user}",
    "gists_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/gists{/gist_id}",
    "starred_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}",
    "subscriptions_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/subscriptions",
    "organizations_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/orgs",
    "repos_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/repos",
    "events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/events{/privacy}",
    "received_events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Octocat/received_events",
    "type": "User",
    "site_admin": false
  }
}
